data.meta_site_name: Fulbright Poland - Największy program wymiany akademickiej i kulturowej USA
data.text:
The Polish-U.S. Fulbright Commission invites Polish higher education institutions to organize information meetings with the Ambassadors of the Fulbright Program. During the meeting, the Ambassadors share their experiences from their stay on the Fulbright grant in the USA, talk about the current scholarship offer of the Fulbright Commission and provide tips on how to strengthen Fulbright application.

Ambassadors operate in 12 academic centers in Poland: Białystok, Częstochowa, Gdańsk, Katowice, Kielce, Kraków, Łódź, Lublin, Poznań, Rzeszów, Warszawa, and Wrocław.

How can a meeting be organized? There is an e-mail address next to the profile of each Ambassador. Just choose a person from your region and contact them directly.

Ambassadors’ role

Active role in the promotion of the Fulbright Program in Poland by organizing outreach events and sharing their Fulbright experiences.

Cooperating with other Program Ambassadors, including participation in meetings and training for Ambassadors.

Supporting prospective Fulbrighters by refering them to resources on how to prepare a succesful Fulbright application.

Cooperating with alumni associations and informal groups of alumni active in their region.

Ambassadors’ profiles

Click on a selected Ambassador to display more information.
